Hi all,

At the begining, i would say pardon my ignorance.

I am new to testing, i have written a few testcases(by looking at exsiting
testcases) using JUnit, but i am still not confident, how and when to write
testcases. When should i make a different testcase and things like that.

I subscribed to yahoo groups, and found all you intellectuals exchanging
ideas on Junit which are certainly enlightening.

My basic question is, Does writing testcases invlove making a different
structure all together, i mean writing classes and then testing them
independently from the code which is a part of my application.

Please if you could write something about how should i proceed to write
testcases, i would be obliged. Your replies will be highly appreciated.


Thanx and Regards,
Manpreet
subject: How to write testcases?
